storyInfo: The Rhodes Island squad reaches the safe house in Long Spring, which is currently under attack by mercenaries and mutated creatures. The Rhodes Island squad fights alongside Team Rainbow to repel the attackers.

attributes.content: Thunderbolt!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Aaaagh...! My eyes!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Where are the casters?! Take out that Vouivre!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What's happening? There's more of them?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We're in a bad way. They've got way too much firepower.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Cut our losses and fall back before this gets any worse.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: ...I see you...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Augh!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sniper! !
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Shit, where?!!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Forget it! Just run!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: ...You're not getting away.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Fall back! Quickly! Just run!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: They're running!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Sitrep!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You okay, Alexsandr?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Yeah, just a flesh wound.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Those guys are learning.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Don't let your guard down!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: We've still got company.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: ...That's close enough, friend.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I appreciate the help, but let's keep a comfy distance until we figure things out.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Relax. We mean you no harm.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We're a Rhodes Island field team! And you're holed up in a Rhodes Island safehouse.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We're responding to a distress call.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Please identify yourselves.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Calm down! I'm here to help.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's the Rhodes Islanders?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Hey, the cavalry came after all!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Go get Mr. Occphen.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Operator? Hooray! We're saved! We're saved! !
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: That's about the size of it.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: So those four mercenaries are the ones who set up these temporary defenses?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I'm really sorry. They broke my communicator, and I couldn't protect the safehouse...
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: I wouldn't blame you if you fired me on the spot...
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Don't worry, this old man doesn't have the power to fire anybody.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: And the way I see it, you held out this long all by yourself. That's pretty fantastic.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: If it weren't for you, these Infected would've met a much worse fate.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: How many are they?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Counting the doctor outside, forty-three. All Infected.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And the four mercenaries were protecting them all this time?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Mercenaries going out of their way to look after Infected. That's something you don't see every day.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Mercenaries who not only don't look down on them, but actively try to help them.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Maybe I'm being too paranoid, but where did these saints come from?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I think they may not realize.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: From the way they talk, I get the impression they were just protecting ordinary, innocent townsfolk.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I guess it's less that they don't discriminate against the Infected.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And more that they don't care about Oripathy.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: But they don't look Infected at all?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I've never seen mercenaries like them. I've never heard of any 'Team Rainbow'.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: They've got guns, but none of them look like Sankta?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Unless the Sankta figured out a way to hide their 'Fluorescent Lamps'...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: A non-Sankta mercenary group fully decked out with big guns like that is gonna be huge news.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Blacksteel R&D would go nuts if they heard about this.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...Let's not talk about them like they're not here.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Regardless, they saved a Rhodes Island Operator and protected a bunch of Infected.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Until we have some evidence, we shouldn't be doubting their motives.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Our top priority is finding a solution to our predicament.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Let's talk to them.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: They've been in there for a while.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What do you think of this Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I've been wondering about them.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: What kind of pharmaceutical company needs a safehouse full of military-grade hardware out on the edge of civilization?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: They've got enough arms and explosives to outfit a platoon.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: And the employees of this 'pharmaceutical company' all look like professional soldiers.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Either this world's doctors are armed to the teeth, or the pharmaceutical business is a front. Probably both.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: They're armed. But they looked well-trained and well-spoken.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: It's a night and day difference with the thugs we ran into before.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Maybe it's just me, but I get a real familiar vibe from them.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You know, I got that too.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: They're reasonable, civilized people, at least. Everything I saw before had me thinking this world was an apocalyptic, bandit-ridden hellscape.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'm finished binding your wound, Mr. Alexsandr.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Thanks, Doctor.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Doctor, are you familiar with this Rhodes Island organization?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: ...I've heard a bit from the caravans.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: They're a group that specializes in critical care for the Infected, as well as an Oripathy research team.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: But isn't it an incurable disease?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Actually, there used to be a lot of people who claimed to be able to cure Oripathy.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: They were mostly shysters who ended up ruined when their scams were exposed.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: As for those who just exaggerated the effectiveness of their drugs suppressing the symptoms of Oripathy, they might not reach the level of fraud yet, but even their suppressant drugs are very expensive.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: I'd guess so.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I once heard about a lord whose daughter contracted Oripathy, and he spent a lot of money to buy the suppressants from Columbia to save his daughter.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Years later, the lord's money dried up, and his daughter died of the disease.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: But look at this.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This is the safehouse's store of Oripathy suppressants.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: These past few days, I injected some of the more serious sufferers with this, and it really did suppress their symptoms. It works better than any drug I've ever seen before.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: This medicine... must be insanely expensive, no?
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: But Mr. Occphen wasn't concerned with that at all. When I told him some of my patients were in critical condition, he gave me the box.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: It's not that I don't believe there are good people in this world, but...
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Hey, I didn't expect that.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Don't overthink it. Suspicion is costly. Whether you show it or not, it's going to get in the way of our talks with them.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: It looks like our goals are aligned, so we can just lay this stuff on the table.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: If you say so.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Oh, they're here.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Now let's skip the pleasantries.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Thank you for saving Occphen. Without you, Rhodes Island would have lost a good worker.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: When the mission is over, I'll make a full report, and Rhodes Island will remunerate you appropriately, and compensate you for your supplies.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Remuneration...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Remuneration is nice.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Also, you put your lives on the line for the Infected. And that wins this old man's admiration.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: These townsfolk have done a lot for us in our time here. Leaving them to die wouldn't be our style.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: So you're mercenaries?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No... We're...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Yes. Yes we are.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: We're mercenaries. The super expensive kind.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Can you give us the name of your company? Mercenaries like you are a rare breed.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Err... We’re... um...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: (Russian) Help me think of a name!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: (Russian) Polar Bear Logistics?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I understand if you're not in a position to say.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We're... We're from a faraway country in... in the south!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That's right! We're from way down south!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The south? South of Sargon? ?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Beyond the foehn hotlands?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Foehn...? Yes, the south. Right.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: There's other countries beyond the foehn hotlands? ?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: That's... shocking. I've lived a long time, and this is the first I've ever heard of people down there.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: In all the records of all the Lords Ameer, there's never been a single report of someone crossing the hotlands.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: (Russian) You could've made your story a little more plausible.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: (Russian) Plausible like Polar Bear Logistics?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Anyway, warriors with Ursine and Victorian accents, it doesn't matter where you come from.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: You're willing to fight for the Infected. And at least on that point, our interests are aligned.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: At least for now, we can work together to deal with this situation.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I can agree with that.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: So who can tell us what the heck happened to this town?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Sarkaz Mercenary...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Controlling the monsters, should be casters.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: They're organized, disciplined, and most importantly, they know when to cut their losses and back down. They're not here for a quick raid.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: They are all properly geared up with Columbian equipment. Some of them were extremely tough back when they sieged the safe house.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Judging from the equipments and tactics, they should be professional mercenaries who signed the 'Redmark contract.'
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I'm afraid it's a rebellion against the local lord.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: But why are they attacking civilians?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: They chased us here from the Infected quarter.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What on Earth do these mercs actually want?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: The most likely answer is they wanted to silence you.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm afraid that's not the only thing they were after.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: When they attacked the Infected quarter yesterday, they were obviously targeting the sick.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: They were trying to round them up.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure that was their goal.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Kidnapping... Infected?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That doesn't make any sense.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The enemy's objectives are a mystery to us, but that's not the most important thing.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: For now, the best thing we can do is wait.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Wait?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You may not realize it, but we're standing in the middle of a fait accompli.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: We walked into this Lord Ameer's territory without his permission, violating his commandments and the local laws. We've broken a major Sargon taboo.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: The town nobility may be in the middle of a war, but they're still the rulers here.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Sticking our noses in anything else at this point would only make our situation even worse.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: The local lord set up an Infected quarter. That tells us he's not totally cruel and heartless.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: He was willing to let Rhodes Island build a safehouse here. That means he's not an isolationist.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I think he'll treat us fairly.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: National law... local government... I get it. That's the best we can hope for right now.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Until the situation changes again, we'll hold out in the safehouse and wait for the riots to die down.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I hope you can help us.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: No problem. We need Rhodes Island's professional expertise too.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: All right then. I'm looking forward to working with the four of you.
attributes.name: Rangers
